texts.name: Blue-Eyes White Dragon (Rush)
texts.desc: This legendary dragon is a powerful engine of destruction. Virtually invincible, very few have faced this awesome creature and lived to tell the tale.

texts.name: Lizard Soldier (Rush)
texts.desc: A beast soldier derived from dragons, it is small for a Dragon-Type. Moving very quickly, this monster is an excellent strategist.

texts.name: Lesser Dragon (Rush)
texts.desc: A minor dragon incapable of breathing fire.

texts.name: Turtle Keeper of Traditions
texts.desc: It honors and reminisces about the good times of days gone past. Ah, the good old days.

texts.name: Binding Chain (Rush)
texts.desc: The mystic links of this chain can rob enemies of their power.

texts.name: Masked Fiery Noodle Ninja Chiji Red
texts.desc: A Ninja with strong springy noodles and a unique texture. There is no escape from his soup-infused noodle shackles.

texts.name: Little D (Rush)
texts.desc: Yo, this tyrannosaurus tot's got a terrible temper.

texts.name: Arma Knight (Rush)
texts.desc: An ammonite warrior that has protected the seas throughout history.

texts.name: Petit Moth (Rush)
texts.desc: This small but deadly creature is better off avoided.

texts.name: Skull Servant (Rush)
texts.desc: A skeletal ghost that isn't strong but can mean trouble in large numbers.

texts.name: Silver Fang (Rush)
texts.desc: A snow wolf that's beautiful to the eye, but absolutely vicious in battle.

texts.name: Feral Imp (Rush)
texts.desc: A playful little fiend that lurks in the dark, waiting to attack an unwary enemy.

texts.name: Faith Bird (Rush)
texts.desc: This long-tailed bird blinds its enemies with mystical light.

texts.name: LaMoon (Rush)
texts.desc: A sorcerer that draws its power from the lunar landscape.

texts.name: Machine Attacker (Rush)
texts.desc: This machine, created to lead charges into enemy territory, mows down enemies by rushing.

texts.name: Crawling Dragon (Rush)
texts.desc: This weakened dragon can no longer fly, but is still a deadly force to be reckoned with.

texts.name: Max Raider
texts.desc: A warrior who wields axes. He has trained his body, pushing himself to the limits. His dual axe-swinging attacks are quite strong.

texts.name: Kuribott
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control no other monsters, you can pay 500 LP.
[Effect]: Add 1 "Kuribott" from your GY to your hand.

texts.name: Whispering Fairy
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can activate this by sending 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[Effect]: Select up to 2 monsters in your opponent’s Graveyard and shuffle them into the Deck.

texts.name: Fire Golem
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can pay 600 LP.
[Effect]: 1 face-up monster your opponent controls loses 600 DEF until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Hilt the Noble Arms Bearer
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None.
[Effect]: 1 Attack Position monster (Warrior) you control gains 600 ATK until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Brave of Dawn, Lydacross
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can shuffle 2 monsters (Spellcaster) from your GY into the Deck.
[Effect]: Special Summon up to 2 monsters (Level 5 or lower Spellcaster) from your hand.

texts.name: Dragon's Setupper
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control no other monsters.
[Effect]: Special Summon 1 "Dragon's Upsetter" from your GY in Defense Position. Your monsters (Level 6 or lower) cannot attack this turn.

texts.name: Dragon's Upsetter
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control no other monsters.
[Effect]: Special Summon 1 "Dragon's Setupper" from your GY in Defense Position. Your monsters (Level 6 or lower) cannot attack this turn.

texts.name: Dragonic Slayer
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control another face-up monster (Level 7 or higher Dragon).
[Effect]: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls.

texts.name: Prima Guitarna of the Colorful Light
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can pay 1000 LP.
[Effect]: All face-up monsters you currently control gain 300 ATK [for each monster your opponent controls] until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Fiendish Commander Yameruler
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If this card was Normal Summoned this turn, you can change its battle position. (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position.)
[Effect]: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, neither player can Tribute Summon monsters (Level 7 or higher) while this card is face-up.

texts.name: Masked Fiery Noodle Jonin Gockboot
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: All face-up monsters (Pyro) you control gain 100 ATK [for each Normal Monster in your GY] until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Defensive Dragon Mage
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 monster (Spellcaster or Dragon) from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 monster you control. It cannot be destroyed by your opponent’s card effects until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Thunder the Lightning
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can activate this by sending 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[Effect]: Select 1 face-up monster your opponent controls and have it lose 300 ATK until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Sonic Jaeger
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None.
[Effect]: Your opponent gains 1000 LP, and if they do, this card gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Mask of Volos
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster (Level 6 or lower) your opponent controls. Its original ATK becomes 1500 until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Saturn King Beetle
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: 1 face-up monster you control gains 100 ATK [for each monster (Level 1) in your GY] until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Warfish Sharkmegalon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can activate this by sending 1 monster (WATER-Attribute) from your hand to the Graveyard.
[Effect]: Select 1 Defense Position monster your opponent controls and change it to face-up Attack Position.

texts.name: Piercing!
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None.
[Effect]: 1 face-up monster you control inflicts piercing battle damage this turn. (When it attacks a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the attacking monster's ATK, inflict the difference as battle damage.)

texts.name: Recovery Force
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: Shuffle 3 monsters (Spellcaster) from your GY into the Deck.
[Effect]: Draw 1 card.

texts.name: Road Magic - Tempest
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control a face-up monster (Level 7 or higher Spellcaster), send 1 monster (WIND) from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Change the battle positions of up to 3 monsters your opponent controls. (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position.)

texts.name: Seal of the Ancients (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: Pay 1000 LP.
[Effect]: Look at all face-down cards your opponent controls.

texts.name: Hammer Crush
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: Send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls.

texts.name: Sparks (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None.
[Effect]: Inflict 200 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Darkness Approaches (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: Send 2 cards from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Change 1 face-up monster on the field to face-down Defense Position.

texts.name: One-Side Flip
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If your opponent controls 2 or more face-down monsters.
[Effect]: Change 1 face-down monster your opponent controls to face-up Attack Position.

texts.name: Mountain (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None.
[Effect]: All face-up monsters (Dragon, Winged Beast, and Thunder) on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

texts.name: Counter Bomb
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When an opponent’s monster declares an attack, you can activate by sending 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard.
[Effect]: Inflict 200 damage x [The Level of the attacking monster] to your opponent.

texts.name: Call of the Earthbound (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[Effect]: You choose which monster you control is attacked.

texts.name: Gust (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When a Spell(s) you control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect.
[Effect]: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field.

texts.name: Reward of Tyranny
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When 2 or more face-up Normal Monsters you control are destroyed by an opponent's card effect at the same time.
[Effect]: Special Summon up to 2 monsters from your GY.

texts.name: 1 Up
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When a monster(s) you control is destroyed by an opponent's attack or card effect.
[Effect]: Special Summon 1 Normal Monster (Level 1 ) from your GY.

texts.name: Dark Magician (Rush)
texts.desc: The ultimate wizard in terms of attack and defense.

texts.name: Dragon's Keyperson
texts.desc: A man who holds the key to the team. No matter what kind of thing flies at him, he'll risk his life to try and stop it.

texts.name: Eleckiss
texts.desc: A slightly mesmerizing blown kiss. The feelings are transmitted.

texts.name: Elengel
texts.desc: A guitar that descended to the world below. Its tone is like that of an angel.

texts.name: Mammoth Graveyard (Rush)
texts.desc: A mammoth that protects the graves of its pack and is absolutely merciless when facing grave-robbers.

texts.name: Megazowler (Rush)
texts.desc: Nothing stands in the way of this spike-covered dinosaur!

texts.name: Bubbly Elf
texts.desc: Her soft and smooth appearance from the good ol' days. She loves to party deep down, but she's a bit too bookish to really boogie. She's besties with her pal Haircut LaMoon, constantly paging each other.

texts.name: Haircut LaMoon
texts.desc: A witch who has escaped her mundane ordinary routine. Her lunar magic captivates guys who are willin' to pick up a pretty lady, as well as pay the bill for a nice meal. Kanan the Ganguro Swordsmistress is her BFF.

texts.name: Kanan the Ganguro Swordsmistress
texts.desc: A lady warrior whose main battlefield is the nightless clubs of the city. Even her sword and shield she'd never relinquish have been dolled up in the totally tubular Ganguro style. She's gal pals with Bubbly Elf.

texts.name: Gyro Jackal of the Beast Gear World
texts.desc: A beast that regularly runs wild in search of pleasure. He's the stingy kind of guy who's only willing to pick fights he knows he'll win, but he's weak against unexpected counterattacks. He tends to get full of himself when he bands together with others, which gives him a wrong impression of his real worth, as he hasn't realized yet that he's useless on his own.

texts.name: Buggy Dog of the Beast Gear World
texts.desc: A dog steals what little dog food exists from the elderly. This dog is drunk on the dark side, and doesn't really believe in anything anymore. He used to hate the collared beasts from long ago, but now he longs for the happiness he had when he had an owner.

texts.name: Motor Wolf of the Beast Gear World
texts.desc: A beast who repeatedly plunders from the people in search of food and gasoline. It's easy to think of him as a lone wolf, but he believes his cruelty is justice, and he's merely doing the best for his gang. Why is howling so heavily ingrained in his heart, even though he's one of the bad guys?

texts.name: Jet Barracuda
texts.desc: It makes full use of its Jet Propulsion Engines to charge startling speeds. There are rumors that it might not even be a fish.

texts.name: Heat Darts
texts.desc: A fish with a protruding proboscis that heats up when attacking. Its light flavor is considered a delicacy.

texts.name: Harpie Girl (Rush)
texts.desc: A Harpie chick who aspires to flit about beautifully and gorgeously, but attack sharply.

texts.name: Vishwar Randi (Rush)
texts.desc: This lady warrior with unquenchable bloodlust serves the forces of darkness.

texts.name: Sevens Road Mage
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster (Level 7 or higher) your opponent controls. It loses 400 ATK until the end of this turn, then, if you control a face-up "Sevens Road Magician", the chosen monster loses 100 ATK [for each monster (Spellcaster) in your GY] until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Lightning Bolcondor
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 monster from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: All face-up monsters your opponent currently controls with the same Attribute as the monster sent to the GY by the requirement of this effect lose ATK/DEF equal to [the Level of the monster sent to the GY by the requirement of this effect] x 300, until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Fullmeteor Impact
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If this card was Normal Summoned this turn and you control a face-up monster (Level 7 or higher Spellcaster), you can send this face-up card you control to the GY.
[Effect]: Destroy all face-up monsters (Level 6 or higher) your opponent controls.

texts.name: Dragon's Defender
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control an Attack Position "Dragon's Keyperson", you can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 Attack Position "Dragon's Keyperson" you control and 1 Attack Position monster your opponent controls, and change them to face-up Defense Position.

texts.name: Dragon's Striker
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control a face-up "Dragon's Keyperson", you can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster you control. This turn, that monster gains 400 ATK and inflicts piercing battle damage. (When it attacks a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the attacking monster's ATK, inflict the difference as battle damage.)

texts.name: Shocklead Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: The face-up monster your opponent controls with the highest ATK (all of them, if tied) loses ATK equal to [the highest ATK among face-up monsters you control] until the end of this turn. This turn, this card cannot attack, except on Attack Position monsters.

texts.name: Bunker Strike the Thrustriking Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If this card was Normal Summoned this turn, you can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: Draw cards equal to [the number of monsters your opponent controls], then choose a number of cards in your hand equal to [the number of cards drawn by this effect], and place them all on the top or bottom of the Deck in any order.
texts.str1: Place the cards on the top of the Deck.
texts.str2: Place the cards on the bottom of the Deck.

texts.name: Romance Pick
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If your LP are lower than your opponent's, you can pay 500 LP.
[Effect]: Send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY, and if there is a monster (Psychic) among them, choose 1 monster (Psychic) in your GY, and add it to your hand.

texts.name: Romic'n'Roller
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If your LP are 2000 or less.
[Effect]: All face-up monsters your opponent currently controls lose 500 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Esperaid of the Smashing Light
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If your LP are 1000 or less.
[Effect]: Choose up to 2 monsters your opponent controls, and destroy them.

texts.name: Battle Commander Nandes
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up Defense Position monster (Warrior) you control, and change it to Attack Position.

texts.name: Dian Keto the Gold-digging Master
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Gain 1000 LP.

texts.name: Catapult Devilkong, King of the Beast Gear World
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send up to 2 other face-up monsters (Beast-Warrior) you control to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose a number of Defense Position monsters your opponent controls equal to [the number of monsters sent to the GY by the requirement of this effect], and destroy them.

texts.name: Super King Rex
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: During your Main Phase this card was Normal or Special Summoned, you can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 Normal Monster (Level 6 or lower Dinosaur) in your GY, and Special Summon it to your field face-up.

texts.name: Wicked Shadow - Dark Rooker
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls, destroy it, and inflict 1000 damage to your opponent, then return this card to the hand.

texts.name: Royal Demon's Heavymetal
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: During the turn this card was Normal Summoned by Tributing a Level 5 or higher monster(s).
[Effect]: You can choose 1 face-up monster (Level 8 or lower) your opponent controls with the lowest Level, and this card gains ATK equal to [the chosen monster's ATK] until the end of this turn. Destroy the chosen monster.

texts.name: Hydrocannon Big Magurom
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose up to 2 face-up monsters (Fish with 1000 or less ATK) you control. This turn, those monsters can attack directly.

texts.name: The Flute of Calling Daemon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control no other monsters and have 3 or more Normal Monsters in your GY.
[Effect]: Send this card you control to the GY, then choose 1 Normal Monster in your GY and Special Summon it to your field in face-up Defense Position.
texts.str1: Special Summon 1 Normal Monster from GY?

texts.name: Medium Octopus
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can pay 800 LP.
[Effect]: Choose 1 Normal Monster in your GY, and this card gains ATK equal to [the chosen monster's Level] x 100 until the end of this turn, then shuffle the chosen monster into the Deck.

texts.name: Innocent Lancer
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: This card inflicts piercing battle damage this turn. (When it attacks a Defense Position monster whose DEF is lower than the attacking monster's ATK, inflict the difference as battle damage.)

texts.name: Road Magic - Diastrophism
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control a face-up monster (Level 7 or higher Spellcaster), send 1 monster (EARTH) from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. It loses ATK equal to [the ATK of the monster in your GY with the highest ATK], until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Lullabind
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control 2 or more face-up monsters (Psychic).
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, and change it to face-down Defense Position.

texts.name: All-Night Fever
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None.
[Effect]: Change all Attack Position monsters (Aqua) you control to face-up Defense Position, and if you do, gain 400 LP [for each monster changed to face-up Defense Position by this effect].

texts.name: Beast Gear World
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None
[Effect]: All face-up monsters (Beast-Warrior, Fiend, and Machine) on the field gain 300 ATK, also all face-up monsters on the field (Dragon, Spellcaster, and Fairy) lose 300 ATK.

texts.name: Thousand Knives (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can activate if there's a face-up "Dark Magician" on your field.
[Effect]: Choose and destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

texts.name: Dark Magic Attack (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can activate if there's a face-up "Dark Magician" on your field.
[Effect]: Destroy all Spell & Trap Cards on your opponent’s field.

texts.name: Kamikaze Blade
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None.
[Effect]: Choose 2 face-up Normal Monsters you control and 1 face-up monster (Level 8 or lower) your opponent controls, and destroy them.

texts.name: Attribute Change Blast
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: Reveal 1 monster in your hand.
[Effect]: Choose up to 3 face-up monsters your opponent controls. This turn, their Attributes become the same as the Attribute of the monster revealed by the requirement of this effect.

texts.name: Blue Medicine (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None.
[Effect]: Gain 400 LP.

texts.name: Mirror Ball
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When your opponent Normal Summons a monster (Level 5 or higher)
[Effect]: Choose 1 monster (Aqua) in your GY, and Special Summon it to your field face-up.

texts.name: Crazy and Complicit
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When your opponent Normal Summons a monster while you control face-up Normal Monsters with 2 or more different Types.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster (Level 6 or lower) your opponent controls, and destroy it.

texts.name: Siesta Hold
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When your opponent Normal Summons a monster (Level 4 or lower) while they control no other monsters.
[Effect]: Change that monster to face-down Defense Position.

texts.name: Spirit Shackles
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[Effect]: The attacking monster loses 100 ATK for each [monster in your opponent's GY with the same Type as that monster] until the end of this turn.

texts.name: 2-Block
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When an opponent's monster declares an attack, send 2 Normal Monsters (Level 2) from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose up to 2 face-up monsters your opponent controls, and change them to face-down Defense Position.

texts.name: Driving Snow (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When a Trap(s) you control is destroyed by an opponent's card effect.
[Effect]: Choose 1 Spell/Trap on the field, and destroy it.

texts.name: Summoned Skull (Rush)
texts.desc: A fiend with dark powers for confusing the enemy. Among the Fiend-Type monsters, this monster boasts considerable force.

texts.name: Light Sorcerer
texts.desc: A sorcerer who gave his body to Heaven. What kind of future awaits him, wrapped in God's blessing?

texts.name: Delivery Machine Whirr
texts.desc: The morning paper's delivery is before breakfast! The evening paper's delivery is also easy as breakfast!

texts.name: Masked Fiery Noodle Ninja Barikata
texts.desc: A ninja who is confident about his hardness. In order to reach the state of Harigane - wire-like sharpness, they train night and day. However, they're not good at Ninjutsu Art of Water-Escape.

texts.name: Mushroom Man (Rush)
texts.desc: Found in humid regions, this creature attacks enemies with a lethal rain of poison spores.

texts.name: Niwatori (Rush)
texts.desc: Swallows enemies whole and uses their essence as energy.

texts.name: Chu-Ske the Mouse Fighter (Rush)
texts.desc: A fiery mouse, travelling the world to become the strongest fighter in the world of mice. Be careful not to touch him, or you will get burned.

texts.name: Baby Dragon (Rush)
texts.desc: Much more than just a child, this dragon is gifted with untapped power.

texts.name: Hitotsu-Me Giant (Rush)
texts.desc: A one-eyed behemoth with thick, powerful arms made for delivering punishing blows.

texts.name: Doriado (Rush)
texts.desc: A spirit of the forest powered by the surrounding trees and wildlife.

texts.name: Water Magician (Rush)
texts.desc: This monster swamps an opponent with an almost endless supply of water.

texts.name: Gazelle the King of Mythical Beasts (Rush)
texts.desc: This monster moves so fast that it looks like an illusion to mortal eyes.

texts.name: Old Man Goatfish
texts.desc:
A weary goatfish.
It is at the point where it can't shake off much of its exhaustion.

texts.name: Star Battle Knight Equelculs
texts.desc: A man in whose body dwells the power of the evil star. To this day he rides through the battlefield believing in his own justice.

texts.name: Sparkhearts Girl
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 monster (Level 4 or lower) from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. It loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn, then you can choose up to 1 each of "Sparks" and "Curtain of Sparks" from your GY, and Set them to your Spell & Trap Zone.

texts.name: Silver Wolf
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control another face-up monster (Beast), you can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. It loses 200 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Beast Summoner
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If your opponent controls a face-up monster (Level 6 or higher), you can send this face-up card you control to the GY. 
[Effect]: Special Summon 1 monster (Level 7 or lower Beast, Beast-Warrior, or Winged Beast) from your hand to your field face-up.

texts.name: Sheath the Scabbard of the Holy Swordsman
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can place 4 monsters (Warrior and/or Spellcaster) from your GY on the bottom of the Deck in any order.
[Effect]: Special Summon 1 monster (Level 7 Warrior) from your hand to your field face-up.

texts.name: Seis the Mighty King of Bestial Wings
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If [the number of face-up monsters your opponent controls] and [the number of Spells/Traps you control] are the same, you can send up to 3 Spells/Traps you control to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. It loses ATK/DEF equal to [the number of cards sent to the GY by the requirement of this effect] x 1000, until the end of this turn

texts.name: Savage Claw Tiger
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect] This card gains 400 ATK [for each face-up monster (Level 7 or higher) you control], until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Treasure Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you have 4 or more monsters (Dragon) in your GY during your Main Phase this card was Special Summoned from the hand or GY.
[Effect]: Draw 1 card.

texts.name: Dragon Merchant
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster (Level 6 or lower Dragon) you control. It gains 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Clear Ice Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can place 1 monster (Level 5 or lower Dragon) from your GY on the bottom of the Deck.
[Effect]: Choose up to 2 monsters in your opponent's GY, and shuffle them into the Deck.

texts.name: Burning Blaze Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can place 1 monster (Level 5 or lower Dragon) from your GY on the bottom of the Deck.
[Effect]: Destroy the face-up Field Spell your opponent controls.

texts.name: Ancient Arise Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: This card gains 600 ATK until the end of this turn. If you have "Clear Ice Dragon" and "Burning Blaze Dragon" in your GY, you can shuffle those 2 cards into the Deck, and if you do, you can choose 1 face-up monster (1500 or less DEF) your opponent controls, and destroy it.

texts.name: Miragias the Fantastriking Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 monster (Level 7 or higher Dragon) from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose up to 2 face-up monsters (Level 7 or lower) your opponent controls. They lose 1500 ATK until the end of this turn. This turn, this card can make a second attack on a monster during the Battle Phase it destroyed a monster by battle.

texts.name: Kesshin the Decided Death Fiendish Commander
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send all cards from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: This card gains 600 ATK [for each card sent to the GY by the requirement of this effect], until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Festivi-Sea Horse
texts.desc:

texts.name: Silent Learning
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you have monsters (Level 5 or higher) in your GY with 3 or more different Types.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-down card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone, and look at it. If that card is a Trap, choose 1 monster (Level 5 or higher) in your GY, place it on the bottom of the Deck, and draw 1 card.

texts.name: 10sion MAX!!!
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: Send 1 monster from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster you control. This turn, that monster gains 400 ATK and inflicts piercing battle damage. If that monster is Level 10, inflict 1000 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Magiquartet Shock
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When your opponent Special Summons a monster (1500 or more ATK) face-up, shuffle 4 Normal Monsters from your GY into the Deck.
[Effect]: Choose 1 monster your opponent controls, and destroy it.

texts.name: Echoing Whispers
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When your opponent Sets a monster from the hand.
[Effect]: Choose up to 5 monsters in the GYs, and shuffle them into the Deck.

texts.name: Yggdrago the Heavenly Emperor Dragon Tree [L]
texts.desc:
[Requirement] Maximum Mode: You can send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect] Choose 1 face-up monster (Level 8 or lower) your opponent controls, and destroy it.

texts.name: Yggdrago the Heavenly Emperor Dragon Tree
texts.desc:
MAXIMUM ATK = 4000
Can be Maximum Summoned together with "Yggdrago the Heavenly Emperor Dragon Tree [L]" and "Yggdrago the Heavenly Emperor Dragon Tree [R]".
[Requirement] Maximum Mode
[Continuous Effect] This card cannot be destroyed by your opponent's Trap effects.

texts.name: Yggdrago the Heavenly Emperor Dragon Tree [R]
texts.desc:
[Requirement] Maximum Mode: You can send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect] Choose 1 Defense Position monster your opponent controls, and change it to face-up Attack Position.

texts.name: Picock Hightron
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control no other monsters and have "Femtron" in your GY.
[Effect]: Send this card you control to the GY, and draw 2 cards, then send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY.

texts.name: Femtron
texts.desc: The source of the dragon tree that hides the providence of creation. As it approaches the infinitesimal maximum extreme, it will lead the world to a new unseen realm.

texts.name: Attron
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can activate if you control no other monsters and there is a "Femtron" in your Graveyard.
[Effect]: Send this card you control to the Graveyard and draw 1 card.

texts.name: Zeptron
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can activate if you control no other monsters and there is a "Femtron" and "Attron" in your Graveyard.
[Effect]: Send this card you control to the Graveyard and draw 2 cards. Then, choose 2 cards in your hand and place them on the bottom of your Deck in any order.

texts.name: Yoctron
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can activate if there is a "Femtron", "Attron" and "Zeptron" in you Graveyard, place those cards on the bottom of your Deck in any order.
[Effect]: Send this card you control to the Graveyard and draw 3 cards. Then, choose 3 cards in your hand and send them to the Graveyard.

texts.name: Pair Production
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: Send 2 monsters (Level 5 or lower Cyberse) with the same Level from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster you control. It gains ATK equal to [the Level of 1 of the monsters sent to the GY by the requirement of this effect] x 400, until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Trap Hole (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When your opponent Normal Summons a monster (1000 or more ATK).
[Effect]: Destroy that monster.

texts.name: Quantum Hole
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When your monster (Cyberse) is destroyed by an opponent's monster's attack.
[Effect]: Draw 2 cards, then choose 2 cards in your hand, and place them on the bottom of the Deck in any order.

texts.name: Clean Beret - Mop Colonel
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If your opponent controls a face-up monster (Level 7 or higher).
[Effect]: Choose 1 "White Foam - Bleach Motor" in your GY, and place it on top of the Deck.

texts.name: Washing Santa Cloth
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: During your Main Phase this card was Normal or Special Summoned.
[Effect]: Your opponent draws cards equal to [the number of monsters they control], then you gain 300 LP [for each card your opponent drew by this effect].

texts.name: Washing Musketeer Washooter
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If this card was Normal Summoned this turn and your opponent controls a face-up monster (Level 7 or higher).
[Effect]: Choose 1 "White Foam - Bleach Motor" in your GY, and shuffle it into the Deck, then draw 1 card.

texts.name: White Foam - Bleach Motor
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster (Level 7 or higher) your opponent controls. It loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn. Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Odd-Eyes Twin Tail Cat
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can activate if you control a face-up "Red-Eyes Black Cat" and "Blue-Eyes White Cat"
[Effect]: Choose and add 1 Lost Cat" from your Graveyard to your hand.

texts.name: Red-Eyes Black Cat
texts.desc: A black cat with red-eyes. It seems to bring either happiness or misfortune to those around it.

texts.name: Blue-Eyes White Cat
texts.desc: A white cat with blue eyes. It’s said if you take good care of them, they will bring you happiness.

texts.name: Cat's Eyes
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can activate if you control 3 face-up monsters (Beast-Type)
[Effect]: Your opponent declares a type of card (Monster, Spell or Trap) and then sends the top card of their Deck to the Graveyard. If that card is not the declared type, all face-up monsters you control can attack directly this turn.

texts.name: Lost Cat
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can activate when a monster your opponent controls declares an attack.
[Effect]: Your opponent declares a type of card (Monster, Spell or Trap) and then sends the top card of their Deck to the Graveyard. If that card is not the declared type, that attack is negated and inflict 300 damage to your opponent.

texts.name: Thunderbeat Bass Drum
texts.desc: A gentle and reliable unsung hero. Even now they make noise, hoping one day they'll be able to meet friends who they can resonate with.

texts.name: Thunderbeat Hi-hat
texts.desc: A reliable big brother with various masks. Even now they make noise, hoping one day they'll be able to meet friends who they can resonate with.

texts.name: Thunderbeat Snare
texts.desc: A unique and always energetic popular person. Even now they make noise, hoping one day they'll be able to meet friends who they can resonate with.

texts.name: Thunderbeat Gift
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control a face-up monster (Level 4 or lower Thunder).
[Effect]: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent [for each face-up monster (Thunder) you control]. This turn, you cannot attack with monsters.

texts.name: Storm-Calling Thunderbeat
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control 3 face-up monsters (Level 4 or lower Thunder).
[Effect]: Destroy all face-up Effect Monsters (Level 8 or lower) your opponent controls. If a monster was destroyed by this effect, you cannot Normal or Special Summon monsters until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Thunderbeat Gain
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When an opponent's monster (Level 8 or lower) with ATK greater than your LP declares an attack while you control a face-up monster (Thunder).
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster your opponent controls, and gain LP equal to [the chosen monster's ATK].

texts.name: Throne of Darkness
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you have 8 or more monsters (0 ATK) in your GY.
[Effect]: Special Summon 1 monster (Level 7 or higher with 0 ATK) from your hand to your field in Attack Position.

texts.name: Dayu the Dark King of Chairs
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 other face-up monster (0 ATK) you control, and this card gains ATK equal to [the chosen monster's Level] x 500, until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Dwell Chair Gear
texts.desc: A mechanical chair that is easy to mass produce. The comfort one gets from sitting on something that used to be alive has been lost.

texts.name: Dwell Chair Bone
texts.desc: The first of the living chairs made by a family of furniture craftsmen. It's got a quirky level of seating comfort.

texts.name: Dwell Chair Saber
texts.desc: The pièce de résistance of the family of furniture craftsmen that they made at their peak. It's very comfortable to sit on.

texts.name: Collapse Chair
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When your Attack Position monster (DARK with 0 ATK) is destroyed by an opponent's monster's attack.
[Effect]: Destroy all Attack Position monsters (Level 8 or lower) on the field, then send cards from the top of each player's Deck to the GY equal to [the number of monsters destroyed by this effect].

texts.name: Cosmic String Noodle-Druidess
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If a face-up "Outer Space" is on the field, you can send 2 monsters (Pyro) from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Destroy all face-up monsters (Level 7 or lower) on the field.

texts.name: Galaxy Narutorolla
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If a face-up "Outer Space" is on the field, you can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: This card gains 600 ATK until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Shiraganeginger
texts.desc: A maiden who floats freely down the heavenly river of the Milky Way. Her figure is like a flowing star. Those who see her and pray to her for wishes to come true are endless, but she dryly comments dreams will only come true by your own hard work.

texts.name: Big Bang Egger
texts.desc: Which came first: The cosmos or the egg? It is the creator of this explosive way of thinking.

texts.name: Outer Space
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None
[Effect]: While this card is face-up in the Field Zone, all face-up monsters (Level 4 or lower) on the field lose 300 ATK/DEF.

texts.name: Charshooting Star
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster (Level 5 or higher) face-up.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster (Pyro) you control, and gain LP equal to [the chosen monster's Level] x 200, then return the chosen monster to the hand.

texts.name: Card Destruction (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None
[Effect]: Each player sends all cards from their hand to the GY, then each player draws cards equal to [the number of cards they sent to the GY by this effect].

texts.name: Shrinker Shrimp
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send up to 2 face-up monsters (Cyberse) you control to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. It loses ATK equal to [the number of monsters sent to the GY by the requirement of this effect] x 300, until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Heavenly Protection
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None
[Effect]: Choose any number of monsters in your hand, and send them to the GY. If [the total Levels of the monsters sent to the GY by this effect] are 10 or more, you can draw 2 cards.
texts.str1: Send any number of monsters from hand to GY

texts.name: Sevens Road Magician
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: This card gains 300 ATK [for each different Attribute in your GY] until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Windcaster Torna
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Change the battle position of 1 monster your opponent controls. (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position.)

texts.name: Answerer the Demonic Swordsman
texts.desc: A demonic sword puppeteering a flame familiar to wield itself. It's said that the one who can defeat the flame familiar in battle will be recognized by the demonic sword as its true wielder.

texts.name: Hydro Magician
texts.desc: A young wizard who can traverse both water and thought. His brilliant dancing form has a blue splendor that dazzles his foes.

texts.name: Dark Sorcerer
texts.desc: A sorcerer who dabbles in the forbidden arts. He still doesn't know the price of the power he desired.

texts.name: Mystic Dealer
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 monster (Spellcaster) from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Draw 1 card.

texts.name: Magical Beast Wolfram
texts.desc: The former familiar of a certain renowned Spellcaster. At some point its magical powers even surpassed that of its master's, and can toy with its opponents effortlessly by controlling flames.

texts.name: Spell Archer
texts.desc: A master of the green bow who is adored by the wind. Their arrows created by magic continue to fly forever.

texts.name: Luminous Shaman
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send this face-up card you control to the GY.
[Effect]: 1 face-up monster (Level 4 or lower Spellcaster) you control can attack directly this turn.

texts.name: Stray Familiar
texts.desc: A familiar that is said to have great power. They've always been a lonely kitten, but they've been recently separated from their friends, causing them to become particularly lonely as of late.

texts.name: Wind Spirit's Blessing
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: Send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: 1 face-up monster (Spellcaster) you control gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Magical Stream
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control a face-up monster (Spellcaster).
[Effect]: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls.

texts.name: Dark Liberation
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When an opponent's monster declares an attack, shuffle 4 monsters (Spellcaster) from your GY into the Deck.
[Effect]: Destroy all Attack Position monsters your opponent controls.

texts.name: Curtain of Sparks
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you have a monster (Spellcaster) in your GY.
[Effect]: The attacking monster loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Dragias the Striking Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: This turn, this card can make a second attack during the Battle Phase it destroyed a monster by battle.

texts.name: Gravity Press Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: 1 face-up monster your opponent controls loses 700 ATK/DEF until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Fire Guardian
texts.desc: The gatekeeper guarding the path to the Fire Dragon Kingdom. Those who cannot withstand its blazing breath are not qualified to go any further.

texts.name: Dragon Knight of Darkness
texts.desc: A dragon knight who leads the dark army. His merciless strikes are without equal. The evil sword he wields consumes the souls of his enemies, continuing to grow.

texts.name: Dragolite
texts.desc: It came from an underground mineral vein. It keeps fighting using the energy of an unknown ore as a power source. Its super hard hitting blows are simply outstanding!

texts.name: Twin-Edge Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: This card can make a second attack this turn.

texts.name: Dragon's Priestess
texts.desc: A young priestess from the bloodline of an ancient dragon. She offers her prayers daily for the peace of her tribe. It's said that her clear eyes can change the future of those they lay upon.

texts.name: Dragon Bat
texts.desc: A mysterious organism, researchers are still split over whether it's a bird or a beast. A flock of these flying together appears sort of draconian, so maybe it's a dragon.

texts.name: Phoenix Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Add 1 monster (Level 5 or higher Dragon) from your GY to your hand.

texts.name: Palm-Sized Drago
texts.desc: A tiny dragon that loves peace. It's very used to people and will come close if you toss it some nuts. Apparently the ring hanging on its neck has some amazing secret.

texts.name: Dragonic Pressure
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: Send 3 monsters (Dragon) from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Destroy all monsters on the field. If a monster is destroyed by this effect, you can Special Summon 1 monster (Level 4 or lower Dragon) from your GY to your field in face-up Defense Position.
texts.str1: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Dragon from GY?

texts.name: Fire Dragon's Heatflash
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control a face-up monster (Dragon).
[Effect]: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap your opponent controls.

texts.name: Dragon Encounter
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a monster(s).
[Effect]: Special Summon 1 monster (Dragon) from your hand.

texts.name: Counteroffensive Dragonstrike
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When a monster (Dragon) you control is destroyed by battle with an opponent's attacking monster, send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.

texts.name: Sevens Road Witch
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Special Summon 1 monster (Level 7 or higher DARK Spellcaster) from your hand, and if it is "Sevens Road Magician", this card gains 400 ATK until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Cosmic String Noodle-Druidess
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If a face-up "Outer Space" is on the field, you can send 2 monsters (Pyro) from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Destroy all face-up monsters (Level 7 or lower) on the field.

texts.name: Road Magic - Explosion
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control a face-up monster (Level 7 or higher Spellcaster), send 1 monster (FIRE) from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Inflict 400 damage to your opponent [for each card they control].

texts.name: Justice Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can shuffle 2 monsters (Dragon) from your GY into the Deck.
[Effect]: This turn, if you would Tribute Summon a monster (Dragon) in Attack Position, you can treat this face-up card as 2 Tributes.

texts.name: Road Magic - Backflow
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control a face-up monster (Level 7 or higher Spellcaster), send 1 monster (WATER) from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 monster your opponent controls, and return it to the owner's hand.

texts.name: Royal Demon's Blues
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: During the turn this card was Normal Summoned, you can send 1 Spell/Trap from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 monster (Level 7 or higher Fiend) in your GY, and Special Summon it to your field in face-up Defense Position. This turn, you cannot attack with monsters (non-Fiend).

texts.name: Bascule the Moving Fortress
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If this card was Normal Summoned this turn, send the top 3 cards of your Deck to the Graveyard.
[Effect] Change this card's battle position. (Attack Position becomes face-up Defense Position, Defense Position becomes face-up Attack Position.) Then, you can choose 1 Normal Monster (EARTH) in your Graveyard, and Special Summon it to your field face-up.
texts.str1: Special Summon 1 EARTH normal monster from GY?

texts.name: Brave of Twilight, Lydacross
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can shuffle 2 monsters (Warrior and/or Spellcaster) from your GY into the Deck.
[Effect]: Special Summon 1 monster (Level 6 Warrior or Spellcaster) from your hand to your field face-up.

texts.name: Kumamon
texts.desc:
The Sales and Happiness Manager of Kumamoto Prefecturue.
His job is to help people across the country find surprises and happiness all around them.
TV Tokyo’s corporate banana, Nanana, can’t hide their shock and surprise at Kumamon’s happy aura.

texts.name: Gaia The Fierce Knight (Rush)
texts.desc: A knight whose horse travels faster than the wind. His battle-charge is a force to be reckoned with.

texts.name: Dian Keto the Prison Master
texts.desc:
[Requirement] You can activate by sending 1 card from the hand to the Graveyard.
[Effect] Look at your opponent’s hand and choose to send 1 card among them to the Graveyard. If you send a monster (Level 7 or higher) to the Graveyard with this effect, you gain 1000 LP.

texts.name: Red-Eyes Black Dragon (Rush)
texts.desc: A ferocious dragon with a deadly attack.

texts.name: Black Dragon's Chick (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send this face-up card you control to the GY.
[Effect]: Special Summon 1 "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" from your hand.
texts.str1: Special Summon 1 "Red-Eyes B. Dragon" from your hand.

texts.name: Inferno Fire Blast (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control a face-up "Red-Eyes Black Dragon".
[Effect]: Inflict 2400 damage to your opponent, also you cannot attack with "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" this turn.

texts.name: Attack Volcano Dragon
texts.desc: The drill sergeant of the Fire Dragon Kingdom's crack dragonic unit. Their blazing burning flames wipe out those who dare insult the king.

texts.name: Traditional Burst Breath
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If you control a face-up Normal Monster (Level 7 or higher Dragon).
[Effect]: Destroy all face-up monsters (Level 6 or lower) your opponent controls.

texts.name: Dragon's Tenacity
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[Effect]: Choose 1 monster (Dragon) in your GY. The attacking monster loses ATK equal to [the Level of the monster chosen by this effect] x 100 until the end of this turn, then shuffle the chosen monster into the Deck.

texts.name: Celtic Guardian (Rush)
texts.desc: An elf who learned to wield a sword, he baffles enemies with lightning-swift attacks.

texts.name: Cyber Falcon (Rush)
texts.desc: A jet-powered hawk that travels at the speed of sound.

texts.name: Necmaid Nana
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send this face-up card you control to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 monster (Level 7) in your GY, place it on the bottom of the Deck, and draw 2 cards.

texts.name: Psycho Burial
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: Pay 1000 LP.
[Effect]: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY, then, if your opponent controls 3 monsters, you can send 1 additional card from the top of your Deck to the GY.
texts.str1: Send the top 2 cards of your Deck to the GY
texts.str2: Send another card to the GY?

texts.name: Acure Shot
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: When an opponent's monster declares an attack.
[Effect]: Choose 1 monster (WATER) in your GY. Gain LP equal to [the chosen monster's Level] x 100, and inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the chosen monster's Level] x 100.

texts.name: Mokey Mokey (Rush)
texts.desc: An outcast angel. Nobody knows what he is thinking at all. Sometimes he gets mad and that is dreadful.

texts.name: Shovel Crusher (Rush)
texts.desc: Armed with a pair of shovels, this monster will destroy anything that stands in its way.

texts.name: Gokibore (Rush)
texts.desc: A large, spherical roach that attacks its enemies by rolling over them.

texts.name: Sky Dragon (Rush)
texts.desc: A flying dragon with four wings housing some very dangerous blades.

texts.name: Ancient Telescope (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None
[Effect]: Your opponent excavates the top 5 cards of their Deck, and reveals them to both players. Then your opponent returns the excavated cards back to the top of the Deck in the exact same order.

texts.name: Amabie (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: None
[Effect]: Both players gain 300 LP.

texts.name: Sevens Road Warlock
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 Trap from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 monster (Level 7 or higher DARK Spellcaster) in your GY, and add it to your hand, then, if you added "Sevens Road Magician" to your hand by this effect, you can choose 1 monster (Level 6 or higher Spellcaster) in your GY, and add it to your hand.
texts.str1: Add 1 Level 6 or Higher Spellcaster from your GY to your Hand?

texts.name: Triad Drago
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: If your opponent controls a face-up monster (Level 7 or higher) and you control 2 face-up monsters (non-Level 3 Dragon).
[Effect]: Draw 1 card.

texts.name: Monster Reincarnation (Rush)
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: Send 1 card from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 monster in your GY, and add it to your hand.

texts.name: Zerogias the Nullstriking Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send 1 monster (Level 7 or higher Dragon) from your hand to the GY.
[Effect]: Choose 1 face-up monster (Level 8 or lower) your opponent controls. Its original ATK becomes 0 until the end of this turn. This turn, this card can make a second attack on a monster during the Battle Phase in which it attacked a monster.

texts.name: Sevens Road Magician
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: This card gains 300 ATK [for each different Attribute in your GY] until the end of this turn.

texts.name: Dragias the Striking Dragon
texts.desc:
[Requirement]: You can send the top card of your Deck to the GY.
[Effect]: This turn, this card can make a second attack during the Battle Phase it destroyed a monster by battle.
